Package FOMS.order_manager

Class CartManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • FOMS.order_manager.CartManager
  • public class CartManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The CartManager class manages the shopping cart in FOMS. It allows items to be added, removed, or updated within the cart with or without customizations. The class also provides functionality to display cart items, calculate the total cost, and manage the quantity of items.

    This class encapsulates all cart-related operations, ensuring that items are stored, modified, and retrieved in an efficient and controlled manner. It uses a LinkedHashMap to maintain the order of insertion for items, which aids in presenting items to the user in the order they were added.

    Since:
    2024-04-24

    • Constructor Detail

      • CartManager

        public CartManager()

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        public void addItem​(MenuItem item,
                    int quantity,
                    java.lang.String customization)
        Adds an item to the cart or updates the quantity if the item already exists. Items are uniquely identified by their name and any customizations specified.
        Parameters:
        item - The MenuItem to be added to the cart.
        quantity - The number of items to be added.
        customization - A string detailing any specific customization requests for the item.

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem​(MenuItem item,
                       java.lang.String customization)
        Removes a specific item from the cart based on item details and customization.
        Parameters:
        item - The MenuItem to remove from the cart.
        customization - A string representing the customization of the item to be removed.

      • clearCart

        public void clearCart()
        Clears all items from the cart, resetting it to an empty state.

      • displayItems

        public void displayItems()
        Displays the items currently in the cart along with their quantities and any customizations.

      • calculateTotal

        public double calculateTotal()
        Calculates the total cost of the items in the cart.
        Returns:
        The total cost as a double, rounded to two decimal places.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if the cart is empty.
        Returns:
        true if the cart is empty, false otherwise.

      • getItems

        public java.util.Map<OrderItem,​java.lang.Integer> getItems()
        Provides a copy of the items in the cart along with their quantities.
        Returns:
        A Map of OrderItem to Integer representing the items and their quantities.

      • updateItemQuantity

        public void updateItemQuantity​(MenuItem item,
                               int newQuantity,
                               java.lang.String customization)
        Updates the quantity of an existing item in the cart, removing it if the quantity is zero or less.
        Parameters:
        item - The MenuItem whose quantity is to be updated.
        newQuantity - The new quantity of the item. If zero, the item is removed from the cart.
        customization - The customization details of the item.

      • getCustomizations

        public java.lang.String getCustomizations​(MenuItem item)
        Retrieves the customization details for a specific MenuItem from the cart. If the item is found in the cart, this method returns the customization string associated with it. If the item is not in the cart or has no customizations, it returns an empty string.
        Parameters:
        item - The MenuItem for which customization details are sought.
        Returns:
        A string containing the customization details if present; otherwise, an empty string.
